resources.string: Enter your registered mobile number and email below:
Q.1 I entered the wrong CVV, why did my transaction still go through?

A.1 The logic of validation of CVV resides with either payment gateways or banks. It is absolutely the choice of banks to have CVV as a mandatory input field or not. As per RBI guidelines, 2-Factor-Authentication is not mandatory for less than Rs.2000 transaction. It is not in control of the owner of the App. As an organisation, we don\'t store any card information.
Q.2 Is there a minimum order value?
A.2 We have no minimum order value and you can order for any amount.
Q.3 Is single order from many restaurants possible?
A.3 We currently do not support this functionality.
Q.4 Do you support bulk orders
A.4 In order to provide all customers with a great selection and to ensure on time delivery of your meal, we reserve the right to limit the quantities depending on supply.
Q.5 Unable to view the details in my profile.
A.5 Please check if your app is due for an update. If not, please share the details via support@xyz.in

string.name: u_don_t_have_an_account_sign_up_now_u
string.u: Don\'t have an account? Sign up now
